contexts.context: But not that alone is the sole <mark>cause</mark> that the baptisms are rising more and more....
...not for the worse like the reform-Jews <mark>caused</mark>, but for the better: To return the...
...those Jews have to live in, and which are <mark>caused</mark> by living cramped like this and having to rip...
...with the world again, which it has lost <mark>caused</mark> by its harmful performance and what it is missing...
